name: promptforge
description: PromptForge - AI Governance & Prompt Management Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shell && npm install && cd ../mfe-projects && npm install && cd ../mfe-evaluations && npm install && cd ../mfe-playground && npm install && cd ../mfe-traces && npm install && cd ../mfe-policy && npm install && cd ../mfe-models && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:shell" "npm run start:projects" "npm run start:evaluations" "npm run start:playground" "npm run start:traces" "npm run start:policy" "npm run start:models"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shell && npm run build:projects && npm run build:evaluations && npm run build:playground && npm run build:traces && npm run build:policy && npm run build:models

author: PromptForge
